name: Museum Madness (itch)
description:
Steal the jewel guarded by lasers by playing microgames!

You control each microgame by using either the arrow keys, the x and z button, or a combination of both. Rapid fire microgame madness!

The intro cutscene can be skipped by pressing x.

Credits

Lead Programmer, Director (and flower game artist) - NOKOI  // https://twitter.com/studioNOKOI/

Lead Artist and Creative Director- AutistSavant

Artist on Keyboard and Menu- Andrew / https://www.twitter.com/andwoo64
